ml.alternet.security.auth.hashers.impl

Interface Argon2Hasher.SecretResolver

  • Enclosing class:
    Argon2Hasher

    public static interface Argon2Hasher.SecretResolver
    You must supply an implementation of this interface in order to support the "keyid" parameter. 
    @LookupKey(forClass=SecretResolver.class)
public static class MySecretResolver implements SecretResolver {
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getSecret(byte[] keyid)
      Return the secret bound to the given key.

    • Method Detail

      • getSecret

        byte[] getSecret(byte[] keyid)
          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Return the secret bound to the given key.
        Parameters:
        keyid - The key ID.
        Returns:
        The secret.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - When the key is not found.
